descr: My name is Miloš Stojanovski, I was born on the 11th of March 1998. in Pančevo. I finished the 3rd Grammar School in Belgrade and now I am studying at the ICT College, Belgrade. In addition, I work as a backend developer intern at ExamRoom.ai. I am creative, hard working, and always eager to learn emerging technologies and further advance in IT area of expertise.
